content: free tutorial & video on crafting happiness https //craftinghappiness com/crochet-snowflake-square 1 when i wrote the pattern for the snowflake hexagon i also made it into a square and today i will show you how to crochet this beautiful festive snowflake square you can make it as big as you want by simply crocheting more rounds i only made it big enough so the tips of the snowflake won t go over the edge 1 https //craftinghappiness com/crochet-snowflake-square
